revision.text: Possibly: Travels through Syria and Egypt, in the years 1783, 1784, and 1785. Containing The present Natural and Political State of those Countries, their Productions, Arts, Manufactures, and Commerce; with Observations on the Manners, Customs, and Government of the Turks and Arabs. Illustrated with copper plates. By M. C-F. Volney. Translated from the French. 2v. (London : Printed for G. G. J. and J. Robinson, Pater-Noster-Row, MDCCLXXXVII. [1787]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2438818~S1
